Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the code to simulate a bank.
    Author:
    John Marx

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bank() 
      Bank(double mon)
      Creates a bank account with money in it specified by the mon parameter.

      • getInterestOvertime

        public double getInterestOvertime(double prin,
                                  double rat,
                                  int numc,
                                  int yers)
        Calculates the interest over a specific time.
        Parameters:
        prin - This is the initial amount of money.
        rat - This is the interest rate. Should be entered as a decimal.
        numc - This is the amount of periods.
        yers - This is the amount of years.
        Returns:
        The computed interest overtime.
